elements.2211.03152_1048ee8861010235415826d707bac: In this paper we present a simple re-ranking method for Automatic Sentence Simplification based on the noisy channel scheme
elements.2211.03152_a0e4174df08375d5439b226e0e6c4: Instead of directly computing the best simplification given a complex text, the re-ranking method also considers the probability of the simple sentence to produce the complex counterpart, as well as the probability of the simple text itself, according to a language model
elements.2211.03152_8e1d393c64aaca868d7b21c2963a1: Our experiments show that combining these scores outperform the original system in three different English datasets, yielding the best known result in one of them
elements.2211.03152_20620f878aed34cb7207e13b27ba8: Adopting the noisy channel scheme opens new ways to infuse additional information into ATS systems, and thus to control important aspects of them, a known limitation of end-to-end neural seq2seq generative models.
elements.2211.03152_978fe34e4201bec0ca049bafe822a: Automatic Text Simplification (ATS) aims to rewrite text into a form that is easier to understand, while retaining the original meaning
elements.2211.03152_2ba8c544796a1d1900d3ea925a22e: Its is an active area of research with many interests in improving web accessibility
elements.2211.03152_2cabd0226b850390ddbaec382c5b5: , and in general it is intended for social good
elements.2211.03152_023b24b3b3d5a6ef28cfea3343317: In the last years there has been a remarkable advance in ATS due to the advent of deep learning techniques and neural language models
elements.2211.03152_e69089f5aeeb2d74775ab34e74ed9: This has lead to a variety of methods that follow the seq2seq architecture to build models that estimate
elements.2211.03152_2e39d0c4be597ccecc6d1466d19be: , the probability of producing a simple sentence
elements.2211.03152_7aeb232eb699af2d45e2eba2bf688: One of the main problems of this approach is the lack of control mechanisms to prevent the system to hallucinate or produce repetition when generating
elements.2211.03152_5e090deb8ba3d03807d1b95e9586b: , as well to infuse new information into the system
elements.2211.03152_3d0ea4b6ad1a3ab931fceb01b9af7: Previous works have tried to control the generation of simple sentences by using control codes that condition the system output with variables such as length, number paraphrases, lexical complexity, and syntactic complexity, etc
elements.2211.03152_e98fab7882604a064eca9c63e62e9: use control prefixes, including input-dependent conditional information pre-trained models, incorporating learnable attribute-level representations at different layers of a transformer
elements.2211.03152_fc734cc244adbde4dcc9a1559f14e: In this paper we propose an alternative method to control the generated simplifications of a seq2seq ATS model
elements.2211.03152_49cc4913d227ec412831b35e7fa0a: Instead of controlling the simplifications at decoding time, we propose to re-rank the top candidates of an neural seq2seq model according to the noisy channel scheme
elements.2211.03152_164c006710354fa65e2b62117b259: , the probability of generating the complex sentence
elements.2211.03152_af660d179f8bb00728a278f227057: , the probability of the simple sentence
elements.2211.03152_ca3d7cdb7a982addf5b9b3d16c75a: We present a re-ranking method that considers all three probabilities using different models
elements.2211.03152_1547f0876167b365c5fbde9c4472f: Because each of the models is independently trained on different data, our method is able to infuse additional knowledge into a traditional seq2seq ATS system
elements.2211.03152_b3a2bc58d56fd8ca8c5dc6d53c1e2: The noisy channel method has been mainly applied in machine translation, but it was also applied for Document Compression
elements.2211.03152_c11890b9f23f63527cb313b9a5bcc: , exactly in the dropping word task (related to summarization)
elements.2211.03152_fa9dba229f0623080843466efdda5: Dropping or deleting words is also one of the operations an ATS systems should carry our, but it is not limited to that: ATS systems should also split sentences, reorder words or sentences and add necessary words or phrases
elements.2211.03152_d70cd3292719e23784c339beb7dd4: Moreover, ATS systems's output should be coherent, and by only dropping words coherence can become deficient
elements.2211.03152_1421642981b614bfea8845375aa68: The contributions of this paper are the following:
elements.2211.03152_c94ae91d7114480718a86d3b728fb: We propose a re-ranking method for seq2seq ATS systems based on noisy channel.
elements.2211.03152_bee5b665938a12f2db7888a0f8453: We show that our method outperforms the original system in three different English datasets, yielding the best known result in one of them.
elements.2211.03152_34972ad074005abbc7b7cf1fe3a9a: We show that the method is able to infuse new information in neural ATS systems, as the additional models in the noisy channel scheme can be trained on complementary data.
elements.2211.03152_35e3e1222fbec1bc7658d5add3eea: Noisy Channel based re-ranking for ATS

elements.2211.03152_cb67783c3aeccb966f2ccea432ce0: The noisy channel scheme is an alternative that has been widely used in machine translation, and which uses Baye's rule to parametrize

elements.2211.03152_743c06224dff031740ac9a19f572b: Specifically, we propose to build three separate models to estimate

elements.2211.03152_1efe18dbb1946f8c4b90452450f62: This section describes the experiments we conducted to evaluate the effectiveness of the proposed noisy channel re-ranking method for English ATS
elements.2211.03152_339af9ac04d294d42a9548dbb08c3: We describe the experimental setup, including the built models, datasets and evaluation metrics, as well as a description of the different systems and baselines.

elements.2211.03152_f20c1feae77b5ad2a4e4eec4d2d1a: The main results on the test set are shown in the bottom part in Table
elements.2211.03152_05d67f4a359fbb9a50eebe14cd920: The NC-TS system obtains the best results on both metrics on all datasets, which confirms the previous results on development, and shows that the method is robust across datasets
elements.2211.03152_0a335ba94b52c2547c27b9e8e7882: we compare NC-TS with state-of-the-art systems
elements.2211.03152_61035515de60ab54bd41f961473fc: Our results are competitive with the state-of-the-art systems and in Newsela we obtain the best results in the SARI metric and a good score in FKLG.
elements.2211.03152_d332c2d7094971155d63537b50029: In this section we present the manual evaluation we have carried out to compare BART against the NC-TS system
elements.2211.03152_b8fa89b58fee5ab3383a0421845f4: We first conducted a manual A/B test comparing the systems in the WikiSmall dataset, the one where the gain of NC-TS is the highest
elements.2211.03152_1c28a5103f08214eddbbb74e2dd84: We sampled 25 sentences from the output of each system, stratified according to the length of the original complex sentences
elements.2211.03152_042b420b59f89138bde5db30e71de: Two linguists with expertise in ATS have evaluated the sample
elements.2211.03152_beec9a1ecb623d951827bdee4ee55: They were not English native speakers, but had advanced studies (one B.A. degree, the other a Phd.)
elements.2211.03152_8e23bdcc74835b2d9b01c46a9a6c7: They were presented the complex sentence and the outputs of both systems, and they had to choose one of them
elements.2211.03152_8f06281088f0adca83ae635d8d506: They were allowed to evaluate both sentences as equal, but were instructed to do so only in very clear cases
elements.2211.03152_2e6ca9b6024eb7cdaad918d5ae6d5: When evaluating the sentences, they did not know which systems they belonged to, neither did they know the reference simplification in the gold standard
elements.2211.03152_e247cf88adaf417b9fbb7cd1730e5: They followed the following criteria in the evaluation:
elements.2211.03152_d5ddba7bfc8c7211a517dcb66854b: Try always to always choose one system, and use equality only on extreme cases.
elements.2211.03152_eef6cf767525fdc453d9961abbc20: Penalize hallucinations and misinformation, since they are known to cause harm
elements.2211.03152_0c940569181523700645f4fdcdf5c: All other criteria being equal, select the shortest sentence.
elements.2211.03152_3dd49e9e702901f4be521e35ea89c: Prioritise the meaning preservation and those sentences that keep the nuances.
elements.2211.03152_81321bc3f21b90bcf34df0a40c788: we present the results of the manual evaluation, distributed in different sentence lengths
elements.2211.03152_fdac6cfe773fd78a41fa23679f0b3: In total, the NC-TS system has obtained the best results (
elements.2211.03152_2840679c42eda06d3c54ec6a8eec1: sentences) and the difference is higher on longest sentences (from quartile 2 on), which implies that the re-ranking is more beneficial on those cases.
elements.2211.03152_730f9f2bedade4cab3c120e55e5c3: We performed an additional analysis on the WikiLarge and Newsela datasets
elements.2211.03152_9841b64b440ab53faa8b8e98ba9cd: simplifications on each dataset where the SARI difference between Bart and NC-TS was highest (
elements.2211.03152_8a50d009b2e949e1403e9626b369d: In the cases that NC-TS is better, we found out that the output of BART is mainly a copy of the original sentence, that is, no simplification has been performed
elements.2211.03152_6b18c13019b1d426aef59f2fd62e3: This happens particularly in the WikiLarge dataset, but also in Newsela, although to a lesser extent
elements.2211.03152_d6709fd34f55c76e201aec9c77f5f: In Newsela, the NC-TS outputs clearly show a wider variety of operations (coreference changes, lexical simplification, person changes) compared to BART
elements.2211.03152_b00f64f3f82ac252e80a19b53eaaf: On the other hand, when BART scores better, we found out that BART carries out slight changes with respect to the original and NC-TS tends to copy the original complex sentence
elements.2211.03152_e7abf8ce4636f55657cae41ad108c: Again, this happens mostly in WikiLarge; in Newsela, the casuistry in the analysed dataset is bigger and no general conclusion can be obtained from the evaluated sample.
elements.2211.03152_77106a8b3245e909907c445b8cb43: In this paper we have presented simple re-ranking method to used the noisy channel in Automatic Text Simplification
elements.2211.03152_759b4967bff1bf951669c0bf47610: We have compared our NC-TS system to a state-of-the-art seq2seq model (BART) and shown that the method obtains better results in terms of SARI and the readability metric FKLG in three well known ATS dataset (WikiSmall, WikiLarge/TurkCorpus and Newsela)
elements.2211.03152_9c5d3acfd1067c5e5e0e2e5f4ac8a: Moreover, the NC-TS system obtains competitive results compared to state-of-the-art systems, and yields best results in the Newsela dataset
elements.2211.03152_0204815c350ce34f12becb98e9b87: In this dataset, the system is able to leverage new information coming from the simple Wikipedia, which is not part of the dataset itself
elements.2211.03152_f8d25e7388318b14d8b194b1490fc: We have conducted manual analysis in WikiSmall, where our NC-TS system has the most profit, and show that its outputs are better qualitatively, particularly on longer sentences
elements.2211.03152_0a6fb3f640d7eee99f758d0aefcf5: In the future we plan to test the NC-TS system in ATS datasets in cross-lingual settings, where the models that compose the noisy channel schema can be trained using different datasets on several languages.
elements.2211.03152_2f1f8a29fdf1ae7199d220efaaa6b: Automatic text simplification is a subjective task: it highly depends on the target audience and experts do not agree on a perfect definition for simplification
elements.2211.03152_422e3787b61773a15a783fb85a08a: Based on that, our manual evaluation can be biased towards the criteria explained in this paper of our experts and their experience
elements.2211.03152_3a3603df100bd6452b14af052a09d: Moreover, all manual evaluations are subjective and difficult to reproduce
elements.2211.03152_e36dcd7a727b2f073313f00dbdb68: This research has only been conducted for English due to the fact of the large data scarcity in other languages
elements.2211.03152_d777f76d265a5005b0e25503048ee: Besides, Newsela, one of the datasets we have used is a proprietary dataset (data can be obtained in
elements.2211.03152_86b1e6eeed6d5989316c8bc43c537: No examples can be shown unless explicitly allowed, therefore hindering the reproducibility of the results.
elements.2211.03152_31190177c2e481d167f5de5ca44e9: In this Appendix we show four simplification examples
elements.2211.03152_3157aad3bb02d0e0ba05b9ec852aa: The first two examples come from the WikiSmall dataset and the NC-TS outputs were evaluated as better
elements.2211.03152_8890439a96b2c2d917596382ae9cf: The third and forth examples come from WikiLarge and the NC-TS scored a higher SARI while in the fifth and sixth examples BART scored better
elements.2211.03152_c7abd11b96d490e0692f2f98d1fb3: We cannot legally show examples from Newsela.
